title: Kaze Ni Naru (The Cat Returns Theme Ghibli)
lyrics:
[intro, build up] (F) (G) (Em) (Am) (D7) (D7) (F-G) (F-) 
Wa(-G)surete i(C)ta me wo toji(Am)te
Tori modose (F)koi no u(G)ta
Aozora ni (Em)kakuretei(Am)ru
Te o nobashi(F)te mou ichi(G)do
 
Wasurenai(C)de sugu soba (Am)ni
Boku ga iru (F)itsu no hi (G)mo
Hoshizora-o (Em)nagamete i(Am)ru
Hitorikiri (F)no yo(G)ake (C)mo
 
[pre-chorus]
Taata hito(F)tsu no koko(Fm)ro
Kanashimi ni (C)kurenai(Am)de
Kimi no tame(D)iki nanute
Harukaze ni (G)kaete yaru
 
[chorus]
Hi no ata(C)ru sakamichi (G)o
Jitenosha de (Am)kakenobo(G)ru
Kimi to (F)nakushita (C)omoide
No(D)sete yuku (G)yo
La la la la (C)la kuchizusa(G)mu
Kuchibiru o (Am)somete yu(G)ku
Kimi to (F)mitsuketa (C)shiawase
Ha(F)na no (G)you (C)ni (C)
 
Wasurete i(C)ta mado ake(Am)te
Hashiridase (F)koi no u(G)ta
Aozora ni (Em)takushite i(Am)ru
Te o kazashi(F)te mou ichi(G)do
 
Wasurenai (C)yo sugu soba (Am)ni
Kimi ga iru (F)itsu no hi (G)mo
Hoshizora ni (Em)kagayaite(Am)ru
Namida yure(F)ru a(G)shita (C)mo
 
[pre-chorus]
Taata hito(F)tsu no koko(Fm)ro
Kono mune ni (C)dakishime(Am)te
Kimi no tame(D)boku wa ima
Harukaze ni (G)fukareteru
 
[chorus]
Hi no ata(C)ru sakamichi (G)o
Jitenosha de (Am)kakenobo(G)ru
Kimi to (F)chikaata (C)yakusoku
No(D)sete yuku (G)yo
La la la la (C)la kuchizusa(G)mu
Kuchibiru o (Am)somete yu(G)ku
Kimi to (F)deaeta (C)shiawase
I(F)noru (G)you
(F)ni (G) (Em) (Am)
(F) (G) (Em) (Em)
(F) (F) (G) (G-stop)
 
[single strum]
Hi no ata(C)ru sakamichi (G)o
Jitenosha de (Am)kakenobo(G)ru
[build up] Kimi to (F)chikaata (C)yakusoku
No(D)sete yuku (G)yo
[normal strum]
La la la la (C)la kuchizusa(G)mu
Kuchibiru o (Am)somete yu(G)ku
Kimi to (F)deaeta (C)shiawase
I(F)noru (G)you (C)ni
[single strum]
Kimi to (F)deaeta (C)shiawase
I(F-let ring)noru you ni [end]
